Title: Relates to the non-therapeutic use of antimicrobial agents in animals
Summary: Relates to restrictions on non-therapeutic use of antimicrobial agents in animals in the absence of any clinical sign of disease in the animals.
LawCode: Add ยง84, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to non-therapeutic use of antimicrobial agents in animals
